akas: Marvel's Avengers: Ultron Revolution USA (third season title)
Marvel's Avengers: Secret Wars USA (fourth season title)
Marvel's Avengers: Black Panther's Quest USA (fifth season title)
akas from release info: Marvel's Avengers: Ultron Revolution USA (third season title)
Marvel's Avengers: Secret Wars USA (fourth season title)
Marvel's Avengers: Black Panther's Quest USA (fifth season title)

1.title: Shadow of Atlantis: Part One
1.plot: Black Panther and the Avengers are called upon to defend New York City from an invasion of monsters.

2.title: Shadow of Atlantis: Part Two
2.plot: Black Panther and the Avengers continue in their battle to stop monsters who have invaded New York.

3.title: Into the Deep
3.plot: Black Panther and his sister Shuri undertake a dangerous mission to sneak into the undersea kingdom of Atlantis.

4.title: The Panther and the Wolf
4.plot: Black Panther and Shuri encounter a figure from their past as they attempt to expose enemies that are hiding within the border of Wakanda.

5.title: The Zemo Sanction
5.plot: Black Panther discovers an unexpected revelation when he meets Baron Zemo.

6.title: Mists of Attilan
6.plot: Black Panther and Ms. Marvel head to the inhuman city of Attilan on a secret mission.

7.title: T'Challa Royale
7.plot: Black Panther finds himself trapped on a tropical island, hunted by Kraven the Hunter.

8.title: The Night Has Wings
8.plot: Black Panther travels to a rural village of Wakanda to investigate a series of mysterious monster attacks.

9.title: Mask of the Panther
9.plot: Black Panther discovers a relic of ancient Wakanda that helps him continue his quest for answers.

10.title: The Good Son
10.plot: The key to Black Panther's quest has been stolen and Panther must recover it before it leaves Wakanda.

11.title: The Lost Temple
11.plot: Black Panther and his allies finally discover the artifact they've been searching for.

12.title: Descent of the Shadow
12.plot: Black Panther and the Avengers work together to protect New York City from a new threat.

13.title: The Last Avenger
13.plot: All on his own, Black Panther must safeguard a dangerous weapon from all who might try to stop him.

14.title: Vibranium Curtain: Part One
14.plot: In the wake of Captain America's funeral, the avengers seek to bring the Black Panther to justice.

15.title: Vibranium Curtain: Part Two
15.plot: The Black Panther teams with an unlikely ally as the two look to escape from a maximum security prison.

16.title: T'Chanda
16.plot: Black Panther discovers secrets about his grandfather, T'Chanda.

17.title: Yemandi
17.plot: Black Panther discovers secrets about his ancestor, Yemandi.

18.title: Bashenga
18.plot: Black Panther discovers secrets about his ancestor, Bashenga, the founder of Wakanda.

19.title: King Breaker: Part One
19.plot: Black Panther must go behind enemy lines to save his foes from an even bigger threat.

20.title: King Breaker: Part Two
20.plot: With an attack coming from multiple sides, Black Panther turns to help from an unlikely source.

21.title: Widowmaker
21.plot: Black Panther explores a secret enemy facility with a nefarious past.

22.title: Atlantis Attacks
22.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

23.title: House of M
23.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: The Avengers Protocol: Part 1
1.plot: Iron Man re-unites the team when Captain America is apparently killed by Red Skull.

2.title: The Avengers Protocol: Part 2
2.plot: After Red Skull steals Tony's armor & declares himself the Iron Skull, M.O.D.O.K. unleashes a plan to turn the Avengers on each other and then New York.

3.title: Ghost of a Chance
3.plot: The rookie Falcon stands alone to save his team and stop a full scale invasion of Earth after the Avengers fall victim to the body-swapping Space Phantoms.

4.title: The Serpent of Doom
4.plot: Thor believes he must sacrifice himself to save the world.

5.title: Blood Feud
5.plot: Captain America leads the team into battle against none other than Dracula himself, to save Black Widow.

6.title: Super Adaptoid
6.plot: Super-Adaptoid takes out the Avengers and Captain America is the last man standing.

7.title: Hyperion
7.plot: The Avengers believe the new hero in town, Hyperion, isn't all he's cracked up to be.

8.title: Molecule Kid
8.plot: Hawkeye and Black Widow take on a covert S.H.I.E.L.D. mission to bring in the son of a super-villain, but when he is revealed to have a world-bending weapon, they realize keeping their mission a secret may be a fatal mistake.

9.title: Depth Charge
9.plot: When Attuma tries to sink Manhattan, Hulk is forced to prove his strength or perish trying.

10.title: Doomstroyer
10.plot: Doctor Doom takes command of the Asgardian Destroyer armor and Thor has to convince the team to trust the one person who may be able to stop him, Loki.

11.title: Hulked Out Heroes
11.plot: The Avengers learn what it's like to walk in Hulk's shoes.

12.title: Avengers: Impossible
12.plot: Impossible Man picks Falcon to star in his new blockbuster.

13.title: In Deep
13.plot: Iron Man and Captain America disguise themselves as villains to infiltrate Red Skull's Cabal, but when their disagreements over strategy cause their cover to get blown, they're forced to take on the entire Cabal alone.

14.title: Hulk's Day Out
14.plot: When Hawkeye discovers Hulk crashing to Earth w/ a message of doom, the Avengers must reconstruct his previous 24 hours to find out what the danger is.

15.title: Planet Doom
15.plot: Thor returns to Earth from a stay in Asgard only to discover Victor von Doom has taken over the world.

16.title: Bring on the Bad Guys
16.plot: The Cabal realizes the one thing they lack is teamwork. They agree to work together in order to defeat the Avengers but fail again - or do they?

17.title: Savages
17.plot: When Tony becomes too reliant on his tech, Cap challenges him to go without it for one full day.

18.title: Mojo World
18.plot: Hulk and Hawkeye suddenly find themselves stuck in a death match at the hands of the intergalactic broadcasting master, Mojo.

19.title: The Ambassador
19.plot: Much to the Avengers & Nick Fury's reservations, Captain America plays bodyguard to Victor Von Doom after threats from The Cabal become far too real.

20.title: All-Father's Day
20.plot: Odin comes to the Avengers Tower demanding his son cease his "fun" on Earth and return to Asgard. Thor promises that if he can't prove the good he does on Earth he'll return home forever.

21.title: By the Numbers
21.plot: The Avengers and the Cabal have a huge confrontation that leaves the team forever changed. Tony also learns that "the stats" can't be trusted every time - there's no substitute for human intuition.

22.title: Guardians and Space Knights
22.plot: When Galactus attacks Earth, Iron Man is able to lead him to another planet but discovers that it is populated and under the protection of the Guardians of the Galaxy.

23.title: One Little Thing
23.plot: While Iron Man and Ant Man are trying to stabilize particles that can shrink or grow matter, Falcon gives them terrible news - his mom is coming to visit, and she has no idea he's an Avenger.

24.title: Crime and Circuses
24.plot: When the Circus of Crime rolls into town, Hawkeye's dark past begins to surface and puts the Avengers in danger.

25.title: Exodus
25.plot: Iron Man's confidence is shaken after he inadvertently puts Falcon in harm's way. When the Cabal pulls the trigger on its final plan, Tony has to put aside his personal dilemma and be the leader he was born to be.

26.title: The Final Showdown
26.plot: With the Tesseract now in the hands of the Cosmic Skull, the world is in catastrophic peril. Iron Man realizes teaming up with the rest of the Cabal might be their only chance for victory.

1.title: The Arsenal
1.plot: When Red Skull comes crashing to Earth with a fleet of alien ships chasing him, the Avengers learn there's a villain in their midst a thousand times more dangerous than the Cabal ever was by the name of Thanos. Upon finding the Power Infinity Gem in Red Skull's possession, the Avengers are led to a gamma-high city to look for something called Arsenal.

2.title: Thanos Rising
2.plot: A new superhero joins the Avengers as the team reunites at their headquarters in Avengers Tower to take on the dangerous villains that inhabit the planet who are looking to take over various cities in an attempt to bring down the superhero team.

3.title: Valhalla Can Wait
3.plot: Hulk and Thor are tricked into a battle and transported to Valhalla to find out who is the strongest, once and for all. But under Hela's rule, only the loser of their contest may return to Earth.

4.title: Ghosts of the Past
4.plot: Red Skull has information that could help the Avengers save the world from Thanos, but an intruder kidnaps Skull before they can retrieve it. Cap discovers that the trespasser is none other than his old partner Bucky Barnes, now the Winter Soldier, who's back and seeks revenge.

5.title: Beneath the Surface
5.plot: When Hawkeye and Black Widow stumble upon the Serpent Crown, they must work together to stop Attuma's battalion from destroying Atlantis.

6.title: Nighthawk
6.plot: When a mysterious new villain named Nighthawk uses the individualized counter measures Falcon created when he was at S.H.I.E.L.D. to take out the Avengers one by one, he must figure out a way to save his team.

7.title: The Age of Tony Stark
7.plot: When the Time Stone becomes attached to Tony's arc reactor, it causes him to de-age and brings dangers from other eras, including dinosaurs, into present-day New York City.

8.title: Head to Head
8.plot: Tony thinks that the Avengers are almost perfect. However, the team has to switch minds when M.O.D.O.K. uses the Mind Stone to take control of S.H.I.E.L.D.

9.title: The Dark Avengers
9.plot: In a flipped reality, where superheroes are super villains and vise versa, Iron Man gets a strange vision after battling the Squadron Supreme. He and the "evil" versions of the other Avengers discover that the Squadron Supreme have the Reality Infinity Gem, and have used it to change the world in their image.

10.title: Back to the Learning Hall
10.plot: Thor is called into returning to Asgard as a guest to Asgard's Hall of Learning for the Learning Games as Hulk and Hawkeye follow him. The visions of Loki lure Thor, Hulk, and Hawkeye into the chambers of the Learning Games where failure is a one-way portal to Valhalla. Meanwhile, earthquakes occur on Earth as the result of Earth and Asgard being pulled towards each other by the Space Infinity Gem which is in Loki's possession.

11.title: Downgraded
11.plot: Stranded in a dangerous realm where his tech doesn't work, Falcon must prove to himself and Hawkeye that he is still a hero, even without all his technology.

12.title: Widow's Run
12.plot: Black Widow and Thor work to carry out Black Widow's plan to rid the Earth of the Infinity Gems upon Black Widow having a vision of Tony Stark using the Infinity Gems to become Emperor Stark and to dispose of them before Thanos returns to Earth. After an attempt to hide them in Asgard fails due to Black Widow's vision of Heimdall ruling Asgard, Black Widow and Thor are attacked by the Guardians of the Galaxy until the Avengers come to their aid. Afterwards, the Avengers are warned by Doctor Strange about the effects that the Infinity Gems are having on reality as ...

13.title: Thanos Triumphant
13.plot: With the power and might of all five Infinity Stones finally in his gauntlet, Thanos plans to wield his power over the Universe while the Avengers make a desperate attempt to stop him. The team is able to rebuild Arsenal and defeat Thanos, but unfortunately, Arsenal gets possessed by the villainous mechanical maniac, Ultron, who uses the little machine's absorbing powers to take the power of the Infinity Gauntlet for himself!!.

14.title: Crack in the System
14.plot: Iron Man works to find Ultron as he controls technology from Hammer Industries and A.I.M. to attack the Avengers. In order to free Arsenal from Ultron's control, Iron Man works on a destroyer malware in order to deactivate Ultron.

15.title: Avengers Disassembled
15.plot: An even more powerful Ultron resurfaces and takes control of Avengers Tower and Iron Man's Hall of Armors, leading to the destruction of the Avengers as we know them.

16.title: Small Time Heroes
16.plot: With the team divided and the Avengers Tower wiped out, Tony seeks help from Ant-Man. Learning he's busy fighting MODOK, Tony's team joins Ant-Man to stop the Pym Particle thief.

17.title: Secret Avengers
17.plot: Working for S.H.I.E.L.D. isn't everything Captain America's team had hoped when they're expected to unquestionably follow orders involving the Crimson Dynamo and The Winter Guard.

18.title: The Ultron Outbreak
18.plot: The Avengers reunite when Captain America and Iron Man learn to appreciate their differences.

19.title: The New Guy
19.plot: When Ant-Man joins the Avengers, Hawkeye resigns and trains his replacement on Monster Island - unaware that Red Skull is nearby planning to cloak himself using Doramammu's powers!

20.title: Terminal Velocity
20.plot: The Squadron Supreme's fastest member Speed Demon is on the loose and wreaking havoc throughout Avengers Tower. Hulk must save the day by fighting the high velocity villain. Meanwhile, the other Avengers face off against Hyperion.

21.title: Spectrums
21.plot: New Avenger, Ant-Man, begins to atone by bringing his former allies to justice. His quest for redemption leads the team to an epic battle with Squadron Supreme's Dr. Spectrum.

22.title: Midgard Crisis
22.plot: Thor is convinced that Zarda wants to defect from Squadron Supreme, but Hulk knows better and must protect Thor from Zarda's duplicitous ways.

23.title: Avengers' Last Stand
23.plot: Falcon tries to prove he can be a leader when the Squadron Supreme enacts their end game and kidnaps Captain America and Tony. Things become even more difficult when the Avengers discover the Squadron Supreme's last few plots were all part of an even bigger plan to revive their previously unknown sixth member named Nuke.

24.title: Avengers Underground
24.plot: Unbeknownst to the Squadron and the rest of the world, the Avengers are in hiding and working on a plan to save the planet and stop the Squadron Supreme once and for all!

25.title: New Frontiers
25.plot: When an alien race begs the Avengers to save them from mysterious invaders, the team discovers that a recently-escaped Thanos and his Black Order are plundering the planet. Meanwhile, Tony seeks new challenges for the team.

26.title: Avengers World
26.plot: When Thanos attacks Earth, planning to finally take over the planet by destroying the Avengers, the team discovers they are more than eight heroes - they are an ideal.

1.title: Adapting to Change
1.plot: The Avengers meet the Scientist Supreme and his new Adaptoids.

2.title: The Ultimates
2.plot: Ultron returns with a scheme to replace humanity with robots known as Ultimates.

3.title: Saving Captain Rogers
3.plot: Captain America battles to rescue Bucky from Baron Zemo.

4.title: Under Siege
4.plot: Hawkeye must defend the Avengers Tower from Baron Zemo who has taken the Masters of Evil members Beetle, Fixer, Goliath, Moonstone, and Screaming Mimi under his leadership.

5.title: The Thunderbolts
5.plot: The Avengers fight to stop Justin Hammer's new weapons factories, but are both helped and hindered by a mysterious new team of heroes known as the Thunderbolts ever since they helped to stop the stimuloid Growing Man.

6.title: Thunderbolts Revealed
6.plot: Still suspicious about the Thunderbolts following a fight with Ulysses Klaue, Hawkeye spies on them and discovers that they are actually Baron Zemo and the Masters of Evil, using a device they stole from Stark Industries to disguise themselves in a plot to outshine the Avengers. When Hawkeye tells the other Avengers about this, the rest of the Thunderbolts must decide on whether they should continue to work with Zemo or help the Avengers stop him.

7.title: Into the Dark Dimension
7.plot: Doctor Strange needs the Avengers' help when Dormammu steals the Eye of Agamotto.

8.title: Dehulked
8.plot: Stark Industries is attacked by thieves who somehow remove almost all gamma radiation from Hulk... leaving Dr. Bruce Banner searching for a place on the team.

9.title: Inhumans Among Us
9.plot: When townspeople are transformed into primitive creatures, the Avengers attempt to help them by putting themselves into conflict with the Inhumans!

10.title: The Inhuman Condition
10.plot: The Avengers must team up with the Inhumans to stop their old foe, Ultron, who plans to unleash a dangerous weapon upon Earth.

11.title: The Kids Are Alright
11.plot: Captain America and Iron Man must partner with new and young Inhumans - Inferno and Ms. Marvel - to stop another Inhuman, The Ghost, from stealing Friday.

12.title: The Conqueror
12.plot: The Avengers try to stop AIM from stealing high-tech weapons from the future, which attracts the attention of the 30th Century warlord - Kang the Conqueror!

13.title: Into the Future
13.plot: Trapped in the 30th Century, the Avengers must beat evil warlord Kang the Conqueror and get back to their own time.

14.title: Seeing Double
14.plot: Black Widow comes face-to-face with Yelena Belova, who in her determination to create the ultimate weapon turns Hulk in the Winter Hulk.

15.title: A Friend in Need
15.plot: Thor teaches the Vision the value of friendship by taking him to Asgard where together they must fight an Ultron-controlled Destroyer.

16.title: Captain Marvel
16.plot: The Avengers join Captain Marvel in a fight to stop a powerful sentient spaceship from destroying Earth.

17.title: Panther's Rage
17.plot: Speaking before The General Assembly of The United Nations, Black Panther is targeted by Crossbones... and has issue with Captain America's possession of vibranium!

18.title: Ant-Man Makes It Big
18.plot: On the set of a superhero motion picture, the Avengers team up with Ant-Man to stop the madman Egghead from destroying Los Angeles.

19.title: The House of Zemo
19.plot: Baron Zemo returns to target the Avengers alongside his father, whom he's brought back from the 1940's.

20.title: U-Foes
20.plot: The team battles a new super-villain, the U-Foes, while the arrival of a new government liaison threatens Hulk's place on the team.

21.title: Building the Perfect Weapon
21.plot: The Avengers alongside their new teammate, the Red Hulk, must stop the Leader from building and unleashing his secret weapon.

22.title: World War Hulk
22.plot: An out of control Red Hulk threatens to destroy a town and it is up to the Avengers to stop him.

23.title: Civil War Part 1: The Fall of Attilan
23.plot: The Avengers must stop Maximus from wreaking havoc in Attilan and causing its citizens to lose control of their powers.

24.title: Civil War Part 2: The Mighty Avengers
24.plot: With the Avengers disbanded, a new team - the Mighty Avengers - steps in to take their place.

25.title: Civil War Part 3: The Drums of War
25.plot: When the Inhumans are mind-controlled into attacking innocent humans, the Avengers must find a way to override their control and end the war.

26.title: Civil War Part 4: Avengers Revolution
26.plot: The Avengers, old and new, must find a way to free the Inhumans and the world from Ultron's control.

0.title: Assemble
0.plot: As we meet the newest Avengers, we flashback to learn about them, their powers, and what makes them heroes.

1.title: Avengers No More: Part One
1.plot: While trying to rescue Tony Stark from another dimension, the Avengers battle the Leader and his newly formed Cabal.

2.title: Avengers No More: Part Two
2.plot: Black Panther assembles a new team of Avengers to stop the Leader and free the original Avengers.

3.title: The Sleeper Awakens
3.plot: Red Skull loses control of his doomsday sleeper robots and it's up to the new Avengers to stop them.

4.title: Prison Break
4.plot: It's up to Captain Marvel to stop Crimson Widow, Typhoid Mary and Zarda from breaking out of the vault.

5.title: The Incredible Herc
5.plot: Hercules joins the new Avengers but he hasn't told the truth about why he's in New York City.

6.title: Show Your Work
6.plot: The new Avengers form an unlikely alliance with Taskmaster to stop MODOK from destroying the earth.

7.title: Sneakers
7.plot: Baron Zemo is out to obtain a mysterious object from Wakanda. It's up to Black Panther and Ant-Man to stop him.

8.title: Why I Hate Halloween
8.plot: The Avengers must protect a Hydra scientist from the vengeful forces of Dracula and his vampires.

9.title: The Once and Future Kang
9.plot: Vision and Wasp head to the future to save Falcon, who has joined forces with Kang the Conqueror.

10.title: Dimension Z
10.plot: Ant-Man travels to another dimension to rescue Black Widow, Captain America, and Hawkeye from Arnim Zola.

11.title: The Most Dangerous Hunt
11.plot: In the Asgardian wilderness, Black Panther and Hulk find themselves chained together and on the run from Skurge.

12.title: Under the Spell of the Enchantress
12.plot: Captain Marvel and Ms. Marvel travel to an icy asteroid to rescue Thor from the Enchantress.

13.title: The Return
13.plot: The Avengers return to see that in there absents Loki has turned The earth turning it into a frozen wasteland and plans to use Asgardian world breakers ships to unleash Ragnarok.

14.title: New Year's Resolution
14.plot: Peggy Carter and Howard Stark find themselves catapulted from the 40's to the present day, but they don't know how. Captain America and Ironman are on the case.

15.title: The Eye of Agamotto - Part One
15.plot: After Hydra steal a magical artifact, it is up to the Avengers to retrieve it before Baron Mordo can usher in a new era of dark magic.

16.title: The Eye of Agamotto - Part Two
16.plot: The vengeful Agamotto attacks the Avengers and attempts to take back the Eye of Agamotto!

17.title: Beyond
17.plot: After a strange energy field appears in Central Park, the Avengers are transported to a new world where Black Widow and Captain America must find Iron Man and battle the mysterious Moon Knight.

18.title: Underworld
18.plot: Loki joins the Avengers in their search for the Bifrost and a way to undo Battleworld and repair Earth. They must battle the Enchantress along the way.

19.title: The Immortal Weapon
19.plot: While trying to find Heimdall's sword, Black Panther and Falcon team-up with Iron Fist to fight Dracula and his vampires.

20.title: The Vibranium Coast
20.plot: Ant-Man and Ms. Marvel must team up with the pirate Typhoid Mary to battle Red Skull and Crossbones.

21.title: Weirdworld
21.plot: After the Hulk and Bruce Banner are separated, Black Widow and Captain Marvel must stop them from harming each other while battling Morgan Le Fey.

22.title: Westland
22.plot: In order to find Dr. Strange, Hawkeye, Vision and Wasp head to the old west world of 1872.

23.title: The Citadel
23.plot: The Beyonder assembles a team of villains to capture Captain America and Iron Man.

24.title: The Wastelands
24.plot: The Avengers must defeat the Beyonder's Ghost Rider army, led by Ares before they can use their new bifrost to undo Battleword.

25.title: All Things Must End
25.plot: When Loki becomes the Sorcerer Supreme, it's up to the Avengers to stop him from complete dominion of the universe.

imdb.plot outline: Can the world's most powerful team of Super Heroes put aside their differences and learn to live together under one roof long enough to save the world from ultimate destruction? The answer will be revealed when the Red Skull and M.O.D.O.K. wage war on The Avengers.
imdb.title: Avengers Assemble
plot: The further adventures of the Marvel Universe's mightiest general membership superhero team.::Kenneth Chisholm

Can the world's most powerful team of Super Heroes put aside their differences and learn to live together under one roof long enough to save the world from ultimate destruction? The answer will be revealed when the Red Skull and M.O.D.O.K. wage war on The Avengers.::Walt Disney Home Entertainment
